title: Effect of label elements in bottled water: Impact on consumer preferences, purchase intentions and health perception through affective sensory tests
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Reynaldo J. Silva-Paz, Tito A. Prada-Linarez, Thalia A. Rivera-Ashqui, Carmen R. Apaza-Humerez, Amparo Eccoña-Sota, Hernán E. Verde-Lujan
